snippet: The singer Amanda Palmer is one of music’s most productive users of social media, galvanizing a modest fan base through constant interaction that blurs the usual line between performer and audience.
abstract: Singer Amanda Palmer is one of music’s most productive users of social media, galvanizing a modest fan base through constant interaction that blurs the usual line between performer and audience; Palmer has raised over $1 million via Kickstarter to fund her next album.
lead_paragraph: The singer Amanda Palmer is one of music’s most productive users of social media, galvanizing a modest fan base through constant interaction that blurs the usual line between performer and audience.

headline.seo: Amanda Palmer Takes Connecting With Her Fans to a New Level
headline.main: Giving Love, Lots of It, To Her Fans
headline.print_headline: Giving Love, Lots of It, To Her Fans
